text: Nancy Whittier is a sociologist and a professor at Smith College. She has written many books, including Feminist Generations, Feminist Frontiers 5, and The Politics of Child Sexual Abuse: Emotion, Social Movements, and the State.Nancy Whittier - Smith College. https://www.smith.edu/academics/faculty/nancy-whittier She was born on September 16, 1966, and lives in Northampton, MA. Nancy Whittier also currently holds a Sophia Smith chair at Smith College. == References == Category:1966 births Category:Smith College faculty Category:Living people Category:People from Northampton, Massachusetts Category:American sociologists Category:Feminist writers
title: Nancy Whittier
